definition: to dry in the air/(fig.) to cold-shoulder

sentences.english: A shirt is taken off a threadlike clothes-line.
sentences.chinese: 一件衬衫从晾衣绳上滑落。

sentences.english: His mommy was headed toward the clothesline with a basket of wet clothes.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈提着一篮子湿衣服，朝晾衣绳这边走来。

sentences.english: The clothes on the washing-line were frozen stiff and I couldn't fold them into the basket.
sentences.chinese: 晾衣绳上的衣服冻硬了，我无法将它们塞进篮子里。

sentences.english: I went down to the local kmart and looked for a clothesline and clothespin.
sentences.chinese: 我来到本地的凯马特百货商店，想要买晾衣绳和夹子。

sentences.english: Look at the clothes on Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 看格林夫人晾衣绳上的衣服。

sentences.english: My outdoor clothesline saves me money, too.
sentences.chinese: 还有我的户外晾衣绳也给我省了钱。

sentences.english: Leave the trousers on the washing-line to air.
sentences.chinese: 把裤子挂到晾衣绳上去晾干。

sentences.english: My clothes are on the clothes line.
He hung his coat on the washing line.
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服挂在晾衣绳上。

sentences.english: He pulled his dripping trunks from the line where they had hung all through the shower, and wrung them out.
sentences.chinese: 他从晾衣绳上拽下被刚才的一场雨浇得湿淋淋的裤权。

sentences.english: They also strung up a clothesline to hang old clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他们还挂起了一根晾衣绳，将旧衣服挂在上面。

sentences.english: Soaking the clothesline in salt water will also prevent clothes from sticking to it in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 把晾衣绳在盐水里浸泡一下也可防止衣服被冻在上面。

sentences.english: Look at these clothes on Mrs Green's clothes line.
sentences.chinese: 看这些在格林夫人晾衣绳上的衣服。

sentences.english: Dry your clothes on a clothesline.
We have a washing line from which we hang clothes to dry.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一根挂晾衣服的晾衣绳。

sentences.english: Just go through your National Clothesline.
sentences.chinese: 只要通过你的国家晾衣绳。

definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
